title: Ticket #5767: Automatically detect DaemonCore daemons.
description:
When we check DC_DAEMON_LIST for completeness, but before we begin spawning daemons (and after we've finished reading configuration), we should param() each entry in DC_DAEMON_LIST to get the path to that [DC] daemon's binary. We should then param() each entry in DAEMON_LIST, and if the paths to the binary match (after canonicalization), declare the DAEMON_LIST daemon object to the DaemonCore.

This will simplify configuration of multiple instances of DC daemons and prevent a class of annoying errors. It will also permit the child ticket.

For example. if you have the following configuration 

    SCHEDD2 = $(SCHEDD)
    DAEMON_LIST = $(DAEMON_LIST) SCHEDD2

The Master will know that SCHEDD2 is a DC daemon because SCHEDD is in the DC_DAEMON_LIST and SCHEDD2 points to the same executable.
